Peter Schweizer — author of the bestselling book Clinton Cash, which is the basis of the documentary film and new graphic novel of the same name — will discuss the new Government Accountability Report revealing how the Obama administration’s Department of Justice has been extorting fines from major banks, which are then used to fund leftist groups that push the Democratic vote.

On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart Editor-in-Chief Alex Marlow will continue our discussion of the issues animating the 2016 election, particularly the Never Trump movement members who are de facto throwing their support to Hillary Clinton.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy will discuss the revelations in WikiLeaks about the Iran deal.
